sub_title: Saas Account Leader in HR Technology, AI and Machine Learning | Driving organisational change in the world's biggest, most complex and innovative global brands | ✔️1 fully integrated TXM platform: CX+EX+RX+MX🚀
summary:
You can't learn to build a Tesla/Polestar by talking to people who have made gas-burning cars for 30 years. A leader's job is more than innovation—it is to see the world through a fundamentally different lens.

Phenom People was founded to revolutionize the talent lifecycle through technology—specifically, artificial intelligence (AI). While our passion is to create jobs and help ONE BILLION PEOPLE find the one that’s right for them, we are not an HR company. We are a technology company that is redefining the talent experience.

Talent experience (acquisition, retention, and evolution) have been misunderstood as separate processes. In reality, they are all connected within a cycle. It is a complete loop.

Phenom People's Talent Experience Management (TXM) platform is an AI-based Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform that connects all the stakeholders—candidates, recruiters, employees, and management—in the talent lifecycle. What does that mean? We bring velocity to recruiting and employee retention. We supply managers and recruiters with actionable data. We provide candidates with relevant information and best-fit job recommendations. And we show employees how to evolve their career journeys at their present companies.

Most of our time is spent listening to customers, learning about who they are and what they want to accomplish. In the process, we’ve realized there’s a common thread that connects them all. The conversations are almost always fueled by three main talking points: the puzzle, the wow, and the fear.

The PUZZLE is what they need. The WOW is what they want. And the FEAR is what they don't want.

The best part of our job is being able to help customers solve problems by addressing the puzzle, the wow, and the fear through technology and our revolutionary platform.

Our mantra is to help ONE BILLION PEOPLE acrross the globe!

I am curious to get to know your company to revolutionize your entire Talent Experience Management lifecycle, while giving you a competitive advantage in attracting, hiring and maintaining the best of the best people on board.

Open to invitations, opportunities to network and interesting business ventures.

Whatsapp or call me : +32 (0) 472 54 49 16
email me : Vic.Vanhove@phenompeople.com 
Help One Billion People! www.helponebillion.com
Website: www.phenompeople.com

profile_positions.description:
POTENTIALPARK TALENT & TECH AWARD WINNER - Europe 2023🥇- I have been nominated by Axa Group as a recognition for my contribution to their employer brand & talent communication efforts, which is based on social validation by the client and objective validation on client performance.

AWARD WINNER 2022🥇- for closing most (48) deals - TOP 5% global in AM deal revenue 

NOT NORMAL AWARD 2021🥇for winning a very tough deal.

CRISPIE AWARD WINNER 2021🥇for curiosity: Constant innovation and improvement doesn’t just happen. It’s rooted in curiosity, which drives our motivation to explore, question, and wonder.

At Phenom People, we believe great people build great companies. We know that there is no difference between marketing and selling products and jobs, so we took CRM best practices and applied them to talent acquisition and built the world’s first Talent Relationship Marketing platform.

Candidates today are not job hunters, they are savvy shoppers. They expect a certain quality of user experience when browsing jobs, researching companies and applying for positions - an experience traditional recruiting tools and tactics cannot deliver. Welcome to the talent relationship business.

TRM is an automated system for managing the talent relationship lifecycle of current and future candidates, driving awareness, interest, engagement and acquisition. 

Phenom People strives to be the most innovative HR tech company in the world. By offering unique, engaging experiences for candidates, our platform helps put the right opportunity in front of the right person at the right time so you can continue to build phenomenal teams and achieve business goals for years to come. Stop recruiting. Start relationship marketing.

My role at Phenom People as a Strategic Account Director is to listen, develop and grow our most complex and strategic clients in Belgium, The Netherlands, Luxembourg and France.

Whatsapp or call me : +32 (0) 472 54 49 16
Email me : Vic.Vanhove@phenompeople.com

profile_positions.title: Owner - Employee

profile_positions.description:
In 2020, I realized a 1.3M sales pipeline from scratch during Covid times.

At Workiva (NYSE:WK) we help Accounting, Finance and Risk teams increase control and reduce risk with connected data, reporting & compliance

With more than 3500+ listed companies as a client in 180 countries, a retention rate of 94.7%, a turnover of more than 300 Million Dollars,  and 5+ billion data elements linked on our platform Wdesk, we are the global leader in connected reporting.

Workiva created Wdesk, a 100% cloud-based productivity platform for enterprises to collect, link, report and analyze business data with control and accountability.

Thousands of organizations, including over 80% of the Fortune 500 use Wdesk. As well as 65% of the Fortune 1000 or below. This is a clear indicator that we scale to address the challenges of the most complex organizations in the world as well as being able to provide extraordinary value to smaller organization and smaller teams.

The platform’s proprietary word processing, workbook, spreadsheet and presentation applications are integrated and built upon a data management engine, offering synchronized data, controlled collaboration, granular permissions and a full audit trail.

Wdesk helps mitigate enterprise risk, improve productivity and give users confidence to make decisions with real-time data. Workiva employs more than 1,300 people with offices in 16 cities.

Wdesk is used for more than 100 different use cases including Financial Reporting, FP&A Reporting, Performance Reporting, Statutory Reporting, ESEF Reporting, SOX Compliance, 262/05, Internal Controls, Enterprise Risk Management, Internal Audit Management, Pillar 3, ICAAP, ILAAP, Stress Testing, Solvency 2 and XBRL | iXBRL tagging.

To find out more, contact me at Vic.Vanhove@workiva.com and visit our website workiva.com

profile_positions.description:
In 2019, I overachieved my total year target (>1 Million Euros) with 113 % for Unit4.

My responsibilities within Unit4 is managing the TOP 60 largest client portfolio on Unit4 Business World, Unit4 Prevero, Unit4 Financials and Unit4 Intuo within Belgium and Luxemburg. 

Unit4 is a world leading supplier of business software for large service and public organizations. With more than 4,200 employees worldwide Unit4 generates an annual turnover of almost 600 million euros. Unit4 delivers ERP, industry-oriented and best-in-class applications. Thousands of organizations from sectors such as business and public services, education, non-profit, real estate, wholesale and financial services work with Unit4 business software. Unit4: In business for people.

We have operations in 26 countries in Europe, North America, Africa and Asia-Pacific, serving our customers in more than 100 countries.

www.unit4.com

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the general management of the office Flanders and all 7 SAGE products on Accounting, ERP and CRM. I had the overall responsibility in steering on all account managers, the growth of the reseller channel, strategic development, partnerships with consulting firms/joint event partners, alliances with vertical software developers, and building networks/lobbying. 

Indirectly, I led a team of 35 people (local partners) with 5 direct employees at Sage reporting to me. Under my supervision, Sage Flanders grew by 15% p/a in turnover and 25% p/a in license sale with various strategic partnerships established such as Use It Group (bouwsoft/groensoft), Compufit, CRM Group and Canon. I was responsible for all on-premise products of Sage such as Sage Bob 30, Sage Bob 50 SME, Sage Bob 50 Expert, ACT, Sage CRM, Sage 100 and Sage ERP X3.

Responsible for hosting big SAGE events and keynote speaker for large crowds.

www.sage.com
